title: Strong Hyperbolicity of Second-Order PDEs via Matrix Pencils
summary: We introduce a definition of strong hyperbolicity for second order partial differential equations using second order pencils. We show that this definition is equivalent to the standard one, derived by reducing the equations to first order form, but with the benefit of simplifying the calculations necessary to check hyperbolicity. In addition, we observe an interesting property, namely that when a system is strongly hyperbolic, its second order pencil can be factorized as a product of two diagonalizable first order pencils. Finally, we present an application to a vector potential for of Maxwell's equations, with a general extension and gauge fixing.

AI.tldr: 论文提出了使用二阶铅笔定义二阶偏微分方程的强双曲性，证明其与标准一阶形式定义等价但计算更简单，并发现强双曲系统的二阶铅笔可分解为两个可对角化一阶铅笔的乘积，最后应用于麦克斯韦方程的矢量势形式。
AI.motivation: 传统上通过将二阶偏微分方程降为一阶形式来定义双曲性，这种方法计算复杂。本文旨在提出一种直接使用二阶铅笔定义强双曲性的新方法，以简化计算过程。
AI.method: 引入基于二阶铅笔的强双曲性定义，证明其与标准一阶形式定义的等价性，分析二阶铅笔的因子分解性质，并将方法应用于麦克斯韦方程的矢量势形式。
AI.result: 1. 新定义与标准定义等价但计算更简单；2. 发现强双曲系统的二阶铅笔可分解为两个可对角化一阶铅笔的乘积；3. 成功将方法应用于麦克斯韦方程的矢量势形式，包括一般扩展和规范固定。
AI.conclusion: 提出的二阶铅笔方法为分析二阶偏微分方程的强双曲性提供了更简洁有效的框架，不仅简化了计算，还揭示了有趣的结构性质，在麦克斯韦方程等物理系统中具有实际应用价值。

title: A Unified Topological Analysis of Variable Growth Kirchhoff-Type Equations
comment: Prepublication version. A revised version of this paper has been accepted for publication in Proceedings of the Royal Society A
summary: We consider a nonlocal differential equation of Kirchhoff type with a convolution coefficient involving variable growth. The novelty of our work lies in allowing a variable exponent in the nonlocal term. By relating the variable growth problem to a corresponding constant growth problem, we establish the existence of at least one positive solution subject to boundary conditions. Our approach relies on topological fixed point theory. The results treat convex, concave, and mixed growth regimes, providing a unified framework for one-dimensional Kirchhoff-type problems.

AI.tldr: 本文研究具有卷积系数和变指数增长的非局部Kirchhoff型微分方程，通过拓扑不动点理论证明了至少一个正解的存在性。
AI.motivation: 研究具有变指数增长的非局部Kirchhoff型微分方程，填补了传统常指数模型在处理更复杂物理现象时的局限性，为实际应用提供更灵活的数学框架。
AI.method: 通过将变指数增长问题转化为对应的常指数增长问题，利用拓扑不动点理论建立解的存在性，处理凸、凹及混合增长机制。
AI.result: 在边界条件下证明了至少一个正解的存在性，为凸、凹和混合增长机制提供了统一的处理框架。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了具有变指数非局部项的Kirchhoff型微分方程解的存在性理论，为一维Kirchhoff型问题提供了统一的分析框架。

title: Corrections to: "The Willmore flow of Hopf-tori in the 3-sphere"
summary: This erratum addresses a logical mistake in the author's article [Jakob, R. The Willmore flow of Hopf-tori in the $3$-sphere. Journal of Evolution Equations 23, No. 72 (2023)] which resulted in two wrong assertions in parts (II) and (III) of Theorem 1 in the author's cited paper and in an inaccuracy in the formulation of the second part of Proposition 6 in that paper. We will not only point out these mistakes and their corrections, but we will additionally give a concrete counterexample to Statement (III) in Theorem 1 of the author's cited article which will automatically imply the optimality of the corrected version of that statement, as it is formulated in this erratum.

AI.tldr: 本文是勘误，纠正了作者先前论文中关于3-球面上Hopf环面Willmore流的两个错误断言
AI.motivation: 修正作者先前论文中的逻辑错误，这些错误导致定理1的(II)和(III)部分以及命题6的第二部分表述不准确
AI.method: 通过逻辑分析和构造具体反例来识别和纠正错误
AI.result: 提供了定理1(III)的具体反例，证明了修正后陈述的最优性
AI.conclusion: 成功纠正了先前论文中的错误，并通过反例验证了修正后陈述的正确性和最优性

title: Supercritical Mass and Condensation in Fokker--Planck Equations for Consensus Formation
summary: Inspired by recently developed Fokker--Planck models for Bose--Einstein statistics, we study a consensus formation model with condensation effects driven by a polynomial diffusion coefficient vanishing at the domain boundaries. For the underlying kinetic model, given by a nonlinear Fokker--Planck equation with superlinear drift, it was shown that if the initial mass exceeds a critical threshold, the solution may exhibit finite-time concentration in certain parameter regimes. Here, we show that this supercritical mass phenomenon persists for a broader class of diffusion functions and provide estimates of the critical mass required to induce finite-time loss of regularity.

AI.tldr: 研究具有凝聚效应的共识形成模型，证明超临界质量现象在更广泛的扩散函数类中持续存在，并估计了引发有限时间正则性损失的临界质量阈值
AI.motivation: 受玻色-爱因斯坦统计的Fokker-Planck模型启发，研究具有凝聚效应的共识形成模型。先前研究表明，当初始质量超过临界阈值时，解可能在特定参数范围内出现有限时间凝聚现象
AI.method: 研究具有多项式扩散系数的非线性Fokker-Planck方程，该扩散系数在区域边界处消失。分析更广泛类别的扩散函数，证明超临界质量现象在这些函数中持续存在
AI.result: 证明了超临界质量现象在更广泛的扩散函数类中持续存在，并提供了引发有限时间正则性损失所需临界质量的估计
AI.conclusion: 共识形成模型中的凝聚效应在更一般的扩散函数设置下仍然存在，超临界质量会导致有限时间正则性损失，这为理解这类模型的动力学行为提供了更全面的理论框架

title: Normalized solutions of quasilinear Schrödinger-Poisson system with critical nonlinear term in bounded domain
summary: This work examines a quasilinear Schrödinger-Poisson system involving a critical nonlinearity, expressed as \[ -Δu + φu + λu = |u|^{q-2} u + |u|^4 u, \quad x \in Ω_r, \] \[ -Δφ- \varepsilon^4 Δ_4 φ= u^2, \qquad\qquad\qquad\quad\ x \in Ω_r, \] \[ \enspace u = φ= 0, \qquad\qquad\qquad\qquad\qquad\enspace\ \ \,x \in \partial Ω_r \] subject to the normalized condition \[ \int_{Ω_r} |u|^2\, \mathrm d x = b^2. \] Here $\varepsilon > 0$, $q \in (2, 8/3)$, $Ω_r \subset \mathbb R^3$ is a bounded domain. By means of a truncation method combined with genus theory, we establish the existence of multiple families of normalized solutions. Due to the presence of a critical exponent in the nonlinear term, the associated energy functional fails to satisfy the usual compactness properties. To address this issue, we invoke the concentration-compactness principle. Furthermore, we derive the asymptotic result that the aforementioned system reduces to the classical Schrödinger-Poisson system (with $\varepsilon = 0$). Our findings extend several recent results concerning problems of this type.

AI.tldr: 研究带临界非线性项的拟线性薛定谔-泊松系统的归一化解存在性，使用截断方法和亏格理论证明多族解的存在，并得到系统在ε→0时退化为经典薛定谔-泊松系统的渐近结果。
AI.motivation: 研究具有临界非线性项的拟线性薛定谔-泊松系统的归一化解存在性问题。这类系统在量子力学和等离子体物理中有重要应用，但临界非线性项导致能量泛函缺乏紧性，需要特殊方法处理。
AI.method: 采用截断方法结合亏格理论，利用浓度紧性原理处理临界非线性项导致的紧性问题，通过变分方法研究归一化解的存在性。
AI.result: 证明了系统存在多个归一化解族，得到了系统在ε→0时退化为经典薛定谔-泊松系统的渐近结果，扩展了该领域的最新研究成果。
AI.conclusion: 成功解决了带临界非线性项的拟线性薛定谔-泊松系统的归一化解存在性问题，建立了多解存在性理论，并揭示了系统参数变化时的渐近行为。

title: The Cauchy problem for the generalized KdV equation in the Sobolev space $H^{s}(\mathbf{R})$
summary: In this paper, we are concerned with the Cauchy problem for the generalized KdV equation with random data and rough data. Firstly, when $s\in\mathbf{R}$, by using the initial value randomization technique introduced by Shen et al. (arXiv:2111.11935) and the construction of appropriate auxiliary spaces, we establish the almost sure local well-posedness of the generalized KdV equation in $H^{s}(\mathbf{R})$, which improves Theorem 1.3 of Hwang and Kwak (Proc. Amer. Math. Soc. 146(2018), 267-280.) and Theorem 1.5 of Yan et al.(arXiv:2011.07128.). Secondly, by using the well-posedness results proved in Theorem 1.1, for $f\in H^{s}(\mathbf{R}),\, s\in\mathbf{R}$, we obtain \begin{eqnarray*} &&\mathbb{P}\left(\left\{ω:\lim_{t\rightarrow0}\|u(t,x)-U(t)f^ω(x)\|_{L_{x}^{\infty}}=0\right\}\right)=1, \end{eqnarray*} which improves Theorem 1.6 of Yan et al.(arXiv:2011.07128.). Thirdly, by using the dyadic decomposition and constructing appropriate function spaces, we establish nonlinear smoothing for the generalized KdV equation with rough data. Furthermore, by using this estimate, when data $f\in H^{s}(\mathbf{R})\cap\hat{L}^{\infty}(\mathbf{R}),\, s>\frac{1}{2}-\frac{2}{k+1},\, k\geq4$, we obtain \begin{eqnarray*} &&\lim_{|x|\rightarrow \infty}u(t,x)=0,\quad t\in[0, T]. \end{eqnarray*} In particular, for $f(x)\in H^{s}(\mathbf{R}),\,s>\frac{1}{2}-\frac{2}{k+1},\,k\geq4$, we prove \begin{eqnarray*} &&\lim_{|x|\rightarrow \infty}(u(t,x)-U(t)f(x))=0. \end{eqnarray*} Finally, by using Theorem 1.1, when $f\in H^{s}(\mathbf{R}),\, s\in\mathbf{R}$, we obtain \begin{eqnarray*} &&\mathbb{P}\left(\left\{ω: \forall t\in I_ω, \lim_{|x|\rightarrow \infty}\left(u(t,x)-U(t)f^ω(x)\right)=0\right\}\right)=1. \end{eqnarray*}

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了广义KdV方程在随机数据和粗糙数据下的柯西问题，改进了多个现有结果，包括几乎必然局部适定性、连续性极限、非线性平滑性以及无穷远处的衰减性质。
AI.motivation: 研究广义KdV方程在随机和粗糙初始数据下的适定性问题，改进现有文献中的结果，特别是在低正则性条件下的局部适定性、连续性极限和非线性平滑效应。
AI.method: 1. 使用Shen等人提出的初值随机化技术；2. 构造适当的辅助空间；3. 利用dyadic分解和构造适当的函数空间；4. 结合已有的适定性结果进行推导。
AI.result: 1. 在H^s(R)中建立了广义KdV方程的几乎必然局部适定性，改进了Hwang-Kwak和Yan等人的结果；2. 证明了连续性极限结果；3. 建立了粗糙数据的非线性平滑性；4. 证明了在无穷远处的衰减性质，包括确定性和随机情况。
AI.conclusion: 该论文系统地研究了广义KdV方程在随机和粗糙数据下的各种性质，显著改进了现有文献中的多个重要结果，为这类方程的低正则性分析提供了新的工具和见解。

title: Strong maximum principle for fully nonlinear nonlocal problems
summary:
In this paper, we study solvability and qualitative properties of nonnegative solutions for a sublinear nonlocal problem with fully nonlinear structure in the form $$
  \mathcal{M}^{\pm}[u]+a(x)u^{q}(x)=0 \; \text{ in }Ω,\qquad u\geq 0 \; \text{ in }Ω. $$ Here $Ω\subset \mathbb{R}^n$ is a bounded $C^{1,1}$ convex domain, $\mathcal{M}^{ \pm}$ stands for nonlocal Pucci extremal operators defined in a class $\mathcal{L}_*$ of homogeneous kernels, $q\in(0,1)$, and $a$ is a possibly sign-changing weight.
  We introduce a new nonlocal hypothesis on the negative part of the solution outside the domain, which together with the negative part of the potential, influences the formation of dead cores and cannot be removed. Our approach relies on uniform bounds from below of the maximum of nontrivial solutions through Liouville theorems, and on a Hopf lemma for viscosity solutions driven by fully nonlinear operators, which we also prove.

AI.tldr: 研究带符号变化权重的次线性非局部完全非线性方程非负解的存在性和定性性质，引入新的非局部假设处理负部影响
AI.motivation: 研究非局部完全非线性算子驱动的次线性方程，其中权函数a(x)可能变号，这种符号变化和域外解的负部会影响死核形成，需要新的理论工具
AI.method: 引入新的非局部假设处理域外解的负部影响，通过Liouville定理获得非平凡解最大值的下界估计，并证明完全非线性算子驱动的粘性解的Hopf引理
AI.result: 建立了非负解的存在性和定性性质，证明了权函数负部和域外解负部对死核形成的影响不可忽略，获得了新的Hopf引理
AI.conclusion: 非局部完全非线性次线性方程中，权函数和域外解的负部对解的结构有重要影响，需要新的非局部假设来正确处理这些影响，所发展的方法为类似问题提供了理论框架

title: Radial Sobolev embeddings on spherically symmetric Riemannian manifolds
summary: We study Sobolev spaces of radial functions on spherically symmetric Riemannian manifolds. Using geodesic polar coordinates, we give a sharp one-dimensional reduction: a radial function belongs to the Sobolev space on the manifold if and only if its radial representation lies in an associated weighted Sobolev space on an interval, with weights determined explicitly by the metric. This characterization allows us to prove optimal Sobolev-type embeddings for radial functions into weighted Lebesgue spaces on both bounded and unbounded spherically symmetric manifolds. As further consequences, we establish new radial lemmas and decay estimates that capture the precise behaviour of radial Sobolev functions near the origin and at infinity. Our results unify and extend the classical radial embeddings in Euclidean and hyperbolic spaces.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了球对称黎曼流形上径向函数的Sobolev空间，通过测地极坐标给出了一维约简，建立了径向函数在流形Sobolev空间与加权Sobolev空间的等价关系，并证明了最优的Sobolev嵌入定理。
AI.motivation: 研究球对称黎曼流形上径向函数的Sobolev空间性质，旨在建立统一的框架来理解径向函数在流形上的行为，特别是近原点和无穷远处的衰减估计，扩展经典欧几里得和双曲空间中的径向嵌入结果。
AI.method: 使用测地极坐标将球对称黎曼流形上的径向函数Sobolev空间问题转化为一维加权Sobolev空间问题，权重由度量显式确定。通过这种约简方法，建立了径向函数在流形Sobolev空间与加权Sobolev空间的等价关系。
AI.result: 证明了径向函数属于流形Sobolev空间当且仅当其径向表示属于相关的加权Sobolev空间；建立了有界和无界球对称流形上径向函数到加权Lebesgue空间的最优Sobolev嵌入；获得了新的径向引理和衰减估计，精确描述了径向Sobolev函数在原点和无穷远处的行为。
AI.conclusion: 本文为球对称黎曼流形上的径向函数Sobolev空间提供了统一的理论框架，将经典的欧几里得和双曲空间中的径向嵌入结果推广到更一般的球对称流形，并获得了精确的衰减估计，为相关分析问题提供了有力工具。

title: Regularity and stability of two coupled Euler-Bernoulli equations with a localized singular structural damping
summary: This paper is concerned with the study of regularity and stability properties of two Euler-Bernoulli beam equations with localized singular damping. Under suitable regularity assumptions on the damping coefficient, we establish Gevrey regularity for the semigroup generated by the associated operator. Furthermore, for a broader class of damping mechanisms, including less regular damping, we derive uniform stability result. These findings provide a detailed description of the long-term behavior of the corresponding dynamical systems.

AI.tldr: 研究具有局部奇异阻尼的Euler-Bernoulli梁方程的规律性和稳定性，证明半群的Gevrey正则性并推导均匀稳定性结果
AI.motivation: 研究具有局部奇异阻尼的Euler-Bernoulli梁方程的长期动力学行为，特别是当阻尼系数具有奇异性质时的规律性和稳定性问题
AI.method: 对具有局部奇异阻尼的Euler-Bernoulli梁方程，在适当的阻尼系数正则性假设下，分析关联算子生成的半群的Gevrey正则性；对于更广泛的阻尼机制（包括较不规则的阻尼），推导均匀稳定性结果
AI.result: 建立了半群的Gevrey正则性，并推导了更广泛阻尼机制下的均匀稳定性结果，为相应动力系统的长期行为提供了详细描述
AI.conclusion: 该研究为具有局部奇异阻尼的Euler-Bernoulli梁方程提供了完整的规律性和稳定性分析框架，揭示了奇异阻尼对系统长期动力学行为的影响

title: Painlevé XXXIV asymptotics for the defocusing nonlinear Schrödinger equation with a finite-genus algebro-geometric background
summary: In this paper, we consider the Cauchy problem for the defocusing nonlinear Schr$\ddot{\text{o}}$dinger equation with a finite genus algebro-geometric background. Long-time asymptotics of the solution are derived in four space-time regions. It comes out that the leading-order term in the expansion is, up to a constant, given by the background solution with a shift of the parameter. The subleading term, however, decays at different rates for different regions. We particularly highlight that in the two transition regions, they are of order $\mathcal{O}(t^{-1/3})$ and the coefficients involve an integral of the Painlevé XXXIV transcendent. We establish our results by applying a nonlinear steepest descent analysis to the associated Riemann-Hilbert problems.

AI.tldr: 研究带有限亏格代数几何背景的散焦非线性薛定谔方程柯西问题，推导解在四个时空区域的长时渐近行为
AI.motivation: 研究非线性薛定谔方程在代数几何背景下的长时间渐近行为，特别关注不同时空区域中的衰减速率和相移现象
AI.method: 应用非线性最速下降法分析相关的黎曼-希尔伯特问题
AI.result: 在四个时空区域得到长时渐近展开，主项为带参数平移的背景解，次项在不同区域以不同速率衰减，两个过渡区域衰减率为O(t^{-1/3})且系数涉及Painlevé XXXIV超越函数的积分
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了带有限亏格代数几何背景的散焦非线性薛定谔方程的长时渐近理论，揭示了不同时空区域衰减行为的差异和相移现象

title: A Formula for Time-to-Frequency Wave Boundary Data Conversion by the Boundary Control Method
summary: Given the wave equation on a compact Riemannian manifold with boundary, we derive an explicit reconstruction procedure to represent the frequency-domain Neumann-to-Dirichlet map in terms of the time-domain Neumann-to-Dirichlet map at any non-eigenfrequency. If the wave equation is exactly controllable, we derive an explicit formula to compute the former from the latter. The derivation is based on the boundary control method and requires only knowledge on the boundary of the manifold. The formula is stable when the level of regularization is fixed. The numerical feasibility is validated using one-dimensional examples in both Euclidean and non-Euclidean geometries.

AI.tldr: 基于边界控制方法，提出从时域Neumann-to-Dirichlet映射显式重构频域Neumann-to-Dirichlet映射的稳定公式，仅需边界信息，在一维欧氏和非欧几何中验证数值可行性。
AI.motivation: 研究紧致黎曼流形上波动方程的Neumann-to-Dirichlet映射，旨在建立时域与频域映射之间的显式关系，为边界控制方法提供理论基础，实现仅通过边界测量进行流形重构。
AI.method: 基于边界控制方法，推导出从时域Neumann-to-Dirichlet映射到频域Neumann-to-Dirichlet映射的显式重构公式。该方法仅需要流形边界的信息，当波动方程精确可控时，可得到显式计算公式。
AI.result: 得到了在非特征频率下，频域Neumann-to-Dirichlet映射用时域Neumann-to-Dirichlet映射表示的显式重构公式。该公式在正则化水平固定时是稳定的，并通过一维欧氏和非欧几何例子验证了数值可行性。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了波动方程时域与频域Neumann-to-Dirichlet映射之间的显式关系，为边界控制方法提供了理论基础，证明了仅通过边界测量即可重构流形信息的可能性，具有数值实现的可行性。

title: Shinbrot Type Criteria for Energy Conservation of the Compressible Navier-Stokes Equations
summary: We prove that weak solutions to the compressible Navier-Stokes equations satisfy the energy equality under a Shinbrot-type regularity criterion. Our method applies to the fluids with both constant and degenerate viscosity and relies on a novel weak-type commutator estimate. These criterion are strictly weaker than those required in prior works [Arch. Ration. Mech. Anal., 225 (2017)] and [SIAM J. Math. Anal. 52 (2020)].

AI.tldr: 证明了可压缩Navier-Stokes方程弱解在Shinbrot型正则性准则下满足能量等式，适用于常粘性和退化粘性流体，使用新的弱型交换子估计，条件比先前工作更弱
AI.motivation: 研究可压缩Navier-Stokes方程弱解的能量等式问题，先前工作要求的正则性条件较强，本文旨在建立更弱的正则性准则
AI.method: 采用Shinbrot型正则性准则，提出新的弱型交换子估计方法，适用于常粘性和退化粘性流体
AI.result: 证明了在更弱的正则性条件下，可压缩Navier-Stokes方程的弱解满足能量等式，条件严格弱于先前文献中的要求
AI.conclusion: 建立了可压缩Navier-Stokes方程弱解能量等式的新正则性准则，显著改进了现有结果，为退化粘性流体提供了理论保证

title: Stability in the anisotropic Calderón problem for Painlevé-Liouville Riemannian manifolds
summary: We study the question of stability of the global and partial anisotropic Calderón inverse problems for the class of Painlevé-Liouville Riemannian manifolds, that is compact $n$-dimensional manifolds with boundary $(M,g)$, where $M=[0,1]\times K\,$, $K$ is any smooth closed connected orientable manifold of dimension $n-1$ endowed with a Riemannian metric $g_K$, and $g=α^4 g_{0}$ is any conformal deformation of the product metric $g_{0}=dx^2+g_{K}$ on $M$ which is compatible with the Painlevé block-separability of the Laplace-Beltrami operator $Δ_{g_0}$. Given a pair of Painlevé-Liouville Riemannian manifolds $(M,g)$ and $(M,\tilde{g})$ satisfying some technical hypothesis, denoting the corresponding Dirichlet-to-Neumann maps by $Λ_{g}$ and $Λ_{\tilde{g}}$, and assuming that $\lVert Λ_{g}-Λ_{\tilde{g}}\rVert_{\mathcal{B}(H^{1/2}(\partial M), H^{-1/2}(\partial M))}\ = ε$, we show a logarithmic stability result for the global anisotropic Calderón problem which says that there exists constants $C$ and $0<θ<1$ such that $\| α- \tildeα \|_{C^{0,r}(M)} \leq C \left( \ln \frac{1}ε \right)^{-θ}$ for some $0<r<1$. Similar results are obtained for the partial anisotropic Calderón problem, corresponding to the case where the data are measured on only one connected component of the boundary.

AI.tldr: 研究Painlevé-Liouville黎曼流形上各向异性Calderón逆问题的稳定性，证明了当Dirichlet-to-Neumann算子差异为ε时，度量系数差异具有对数稳定性估计。
AI.motivation: Calderón逆问题旨在通过边界测量数据重建介质内部电导率。各向异性情况更具挑战性，需要研究其稳定性以了解测量误差如何影响重建精度。
AI.method: 研究Painlevé-Liouville黎曼流形类，即具有边界且度量结构为[0,1]×K的紧致流形。利用Laplace-Beltrami算子的Painlevé块可分离性，分析Dirichlet-to-Neumann算子的差异。
AI.result: 证明了全局各向异性Calderón问题的对数稳定性：存在常数C和0<θ<1，使得‖α-α̃‖_{C^{0,r}(M)} ≤ C(ln(1/ε))^{-θ}。对部分边界测量情况也得到了类似结果。
AI.conclusion: 对于Painlevé-Liouville黎曼流形类，各向异性Calderón逆问题具有对数稳定性，这意味着重建精度随测量误差减小而提高，但提高速度是对数级的。

title: Resolvent approaches to elliptic regularity in stationary Fokker-Planck equations
summary: This paper investigates the local regularity of solutions to stationary Fokker-Planck equations on an open set $U \subset \mathbb{R}^d$ with $d \geq 2$. A central objective is to relax the classical assumptions on the coefficients by focusing on the case where the drift vector field $\mathbf{G}$ is only assumed to be locally square-integrable, i.e. $\mathbf{G} \in L^2_{loc}(U, \mathbb{R}^d)$, the diffusion matrix $A = (a_{ij})_{1 \leq i,j \leq d}$ is assumed to be locally uniformly strictly elliptic and bounded, with coefficients satisfying $\frac{a_{ij}+a_{ji}}{2} \in VMO_{loc}(U)$ for all $1 \leq i,j \leq d$ and ${\rm div}A \in L^2_{loc}(U, \mathbb{R}^d)$. Our main result shows that any locally bounded function $h \in L^\infty_{loc}(U)$ satisfying the stationary Fokker-Planck equation $L^*(h\, dx) = 0$ must in fact belong to the local Sobolev space $H^{1,2}_{loc}(U)$. The proof is based on the construction of a sub-Markovian resolvent associated with the principal elliptic operator $L^A := \operatorname{trace}(A \nabla^2)$, combined with delicate energy-type inequalities. In particular, we show that the density $h$ can be realized as the weak $H^{1,2}$-limit of images of resolvent operators.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了平稳Fokker-Planck方程解的局部正则性，在较弱的系数假设下证明了局部有界解实际上属于局部Sobolev空间H^{1,2}_{loc}
AI.motivation: 传统Fokker-Planck方程理论通常要求系数具有较高的正则性。本文旨在放宽这些经典假设，特别是允许漂移向量场仅局部平方可积，扩散矩阵系数满足VMO条件，从而扩展理论适用范围。
AI.method: 通过构造与主椭圆算子L^A相关的次马尔可夫预解式，结合精细的能量型不等式，证明密度函数h可以作为预解算子图像的弱H^{1,2}极限实现。
AI.result: 主要结果表明：在较弱的系数假设下，任何满足平稳Fokker-Planck方程L^*(h dx)=0的局部有界函数h，实际上必定属于局部Sobolev空间H^{1,2}_{loc}(U)。
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功地将Fokker-Planck方程解的正则性理论扩展到系数条件更弱的情形，为处理非光滑系数的扩散过程提供了理论工具。

title: Entire solutions to a strongly competitive nonlinear Schrödinger system
summary: We build infinitely-many non-radial positive solutions to the Schrödinger system \begin{equation*} \left\{\begin{aligned} &-Δu_1+u_1=u_1^{{\mathfrak p} }-Λu_1^{a_1} u_2^{a_2}\ \hbox{in}\ \mathbb R^N\\ &-Δu_2+u_2=u_2^{{\mathfrak p} }-Λu_1^{b_1}u_2^{b_2} \ \hbox{in}\ \mathbb R^N\\ \end{aligned}\right. \end{equation*} with sub-critical $\mathfrak p$-growth as $Λ\to +\infty$. The profile of each component is the sum of several copies of the positive solution to $-ΔU+U=U^{{\mathfrak p} }$ in $\mathbb R^N$, centered at suitable {\em peaks} whose mutual distances diverge as $Λ$ increases. More precisely, given two concentric regular polygons with $k$ sides and very large radii, the peaks of the first component are arranged along the edges of the {\em outer} polygon, alternated with those of the second component, and along the $k$ rays joining the vertices of the two polygons. To the best of our knowledge, this provides the first example of non-radial positive solutions for strongly competitive Schrödinger systems in the whole space.

AI.tldr: 构建了无穷多非径向正解，用于具有亚临界增长和强竞争项的薛定谔方程组，当Λ→∞时，解由多个基态解的叠加构成，峰值点位于两个同心正多边形的特定位置。
AI.motivation: 研究具有强竞争项的薛定谔方程组在整空间中的非径向正解存在性。以往研究多关注径向解，本文首次为强竞争薛定谔系统在整空间中构造非径向正解。
AI.method: 使用变分方法，构造解的形式为多个基态解（-ΔU+U=U^𝔭的正解）的叠加。峰值点安排策略：给定两个同心正k边形（半径很大），第一个分量的峰值沿外多边形边排列，第二个分量的峰值沿内多边形边排列，且交替分布，同时在连接两个多边形顶点的k条射线上也安排峰值。
AI.result: 成功构造了无穷多非径向正解，当Λ→∞时，解的每个分量由多个基态解叠加而成，峰值点之间的相互距离随Λ增大而发散。这是强竞争薛定谔系统在整空间中非径向正解的首个例子。
AI.conclusion: 证明了在强竞争参数Λ→∞时，薛定谔系统存在无穷多非径向正解，解的结构由基态解在特定几何配置的峰值点上叠加而成，为研究此类系统的解结构提供了新视角。

title: Contraction of viscous-dispersive shocks: Zero viscosity-capillarity limits
summary: We prove the contraction property of any large solution perturbed from a viscous-dispersive shock wave of the Navier--Stokes--Korteweg (NSK) system. The contraction holds up to a dynamical shift, since the contraction is measured by the relative entropy that is locally $L^2$. We use the contraction property to show the global existence of large solution perturbed from a viscous-dispersive shock wave. To prove the contraction property, we first employ the effective velocity to transform the NSK system into the system of two degenerate parabolic equations, then apply the method of $a$-contraction with shifts. The contraction property does not depend on the strengths of viscosity and capillarity. Based on this uniformity, we show the existence of zero viscosity-capillarity limits of solutions to the NSK system, on which Riemann shocks are unique and stable up to shifts.

AI.tldr: 证明Navier-Stokes-Korteweg系统粘性-色散激波大扰动解的收缩性，用于全局存在性和零粘性-毛细极限
AI.motivation: 研究NSK系统中粘性-色散激波的大扰动解的稳定性，建立收缩性质以证明全局存在性，并探索零粘性-毛细极限下Riemann激波的唯一性和稳定性
AI.method: 首先使用有效速度将NSK系统转化为两个退化抛物方程，然后应用带位移的a-收缩方法，收缩性质不依赖于粘性和毛细强度
AI.result: 证明了NSK系统粘性-色散激波大扰动解的收缩性质，基于此建立了全局存在性，并证明了零粘性-毛细极限下Riemann激波的唯一性和稳定性（直到位移）
AI.conclusion: NSK系统的粘性-色散激波在大扰动下具有收缩性质，这为全局存在性和零粘性-毛细极限提供了理论基础，Riemann激波在极限下保持唯一性和稳定性

title: Liouville-type theorems for Lane--Emden inequalities involving nonlocal operators
summary: We establish a Liouville-type theorem for nonnegative weak supersolutions to $\mathcal{L}_K u = u^q$ in $\mathbb{R}^n$, where $\mathcal{L}_K$ is a translation-invariant integro-differential operator of order $2s$ with $s \in (0,1)$. The kernel $K$ is assumed to be even and satisfy uniform ellipticity bounds. We prove that the only nonnegative supersolution is the trivial one $u \equiv 0$ in the range $1 < q \le \frac{n}{n-2s}$ for $n > 2s$ (and for all $q > 1$ when $n \le 2s$). Our proof is elementary and relies on a test function method combined with a dyadic decomposition of the nonlocal tail. Notably, our argument does not rely on the maximum principle or the fundamental solution.

AI.tldr: 论文证明了非负弱上解的李雅普诺夫型定理：对于积分微分方程，在特定指数范围内，只有零解存在。
AI.motivation: 研究非局部积分微分算子的李雅普诺夫型定理，这类定理在偏微分方程理论中具有重要意义，可以描述解的存在性和唯一性条件。
AI.method: 使用测试函数方法结合非局部尾项的二分分解，不依赖最大值原理或基本解，采用初等方法证明。
AI.result: 证明了当 $1 < q \le \frac{n}{n-2s}$（$n > 2s$ 时）或所有 $q > 1$（$n \le 2s$ 时），唯一的非负上解是零解 $u \equiv 0$。
AI.conclusion: 建立了非局部积分微分算子的李雅普诺夫型定理，为这类方程的解结构提供了重要理论结果，证明方法简洁有效。

title: Exact non-stationary solutions of the Euler equations in two and three dimensions
comment: Draft version prior to submission for publication
summary: We develop, via Arnold's geometric framework, a mechanism for constructing explicit, smooth, global-in-time, and typically non-stationary solutions of the incompressible Euler equations. The approach introduces a notion of generalized Coriolis force, whose spectrum underlies the construction of these solutions. In the setting of ideal hydrodynamics, the construction recovers classical exact solutions such as Kelvin and Rossby-Haurwitz waves, while also producing new explicit examples on curved surfaces and three-dimensional manifolds including the round three-sphere. We further obtain a complete classification in two dimensions and a partial classification in three dimensions of the Riemannian manifolds that admit such solutions. The method is also formulated in the general Euler-Arnold setting and yields a simple criterion for non-stationarity.

AI.tldr: 提出基于Arnold几何框架的机制，构造不可压缩欧拉方程的显式、光滑、全局时间解，包括非定常解，并推广到一般欧拉-Arnold情形
AI.motivation: 开发一种系统方法，构造不可压缩欧拉方程的显式解，特别是非定常解，扩展经典解（如Kelvin波和Rossby-Haurwitz波）并产生新解
AI.method: 基于Arnold几何框架，引入广义科里奥利力的概念，利用其谱构造解；在理想流体动力学中应用，并推广到一般欧拉-Arnold情形
AI.result: 在二维曲面上获得完全分类，在三维流形（包括三维球面）上获得部分分类；构造出新的显式解；得到非定常性的简单判据
AI.conclusion: 该方法为构造不可压缩欧拉方程的显式解提供了系统框架，统一了经典解并产生新解，在几何流体动力学中有广泛应用

title: Global regularity for axisymmetric, swirl-free solutions of the Euler equation in four dimensions
summary: In this paper, we prove global regularity for all smooth, axisymmetric, swirl-free solutions of the Euler equation in four dimensions. Previous works establishing global regularity for certain axisymmetric, swirl-free solutions of the Euler equation in four dimensions required the additional assumption that $\frac{ω^0}{r^2}\in L^\infty$, which can fail even for Schwartz class solutions. The key advance is a new bound on the vortex stretching term that only requires $\frac{ω^0}{r^2}\in L^{2,1}(\mathbb{R}^4)$, which is generically true for any axisymmetric, swirl-free initial data $u^0\in H^s\left(\mathbb{R}^4\right), s>4$, with reasonable decay at infinity.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了四维欧拉方程所有光滑、轴对称、无旋流解的全局正则性，突破了先前需要额外假设$\frac{ω^0}{r^2}\in L^\infty$的限制。
AI.motivation: 先前研究四维欧拉方程轴对称无旋流解的全局正则性时，需要额外假设$\frac{ω^0}{r^2}\in L^\infty$，但这个条件即使对Schwartz类解也可能不成立。本文旨在消除这一限制，建立更一般的全局正则性理论。
AI.method: 提出新的涡旋拉伸项估计方法，仅要求$\frac{ω^0}{r^2}\in L^{2,1}(\mathbb{R}^4)$，这个条件对任何轴对称无旋初始数据$u^0\in H^s\left(\mathbb{R}^4\right), s>4$且在无穷远处有合理衰减的情况下通常成立。
AI.result: 成功证明了四维欧拉方程所有光滑、轴对称、无旋流解的全局正则性，不再需要先前研究中$\frac{ω^0}{r^2}\in L^\infty$的强假设条件。
AI.conclusion: 通过改进涡旋拉伸项的估计技术，建立了四维欧拉方程轴对称无旋流解全局正则性的更一般理论，填补了先前研究的限制条件过强的缺陷。

title: Constrained variational problems on perturbed lattice graphs

AI.tldr: 研究扰动晶格图上约束变分问题：1) Schrödinger方程归一化解的存在性；2) Sobolev不等式极值函数的存在性。对于删除有限边的图，存在阈值α_G决定归一化解存在性；对于添加有限边的图，存在特定边集使归一化解不存在。
AI.motivation: 研究扰动晶格图（通过添加或删除有限边得到的图）上的约束变分问题，探索图结构变化对Schrödinger方程归一化解和Sobolev不等式极值函数存在性的影响。
AI.method: 分析两种类型的扰动晶格图：1) 通过删除有限边但保持连通性的图；2) 通过添加有限边得到的图。研究Schrödinger方程归一化解的存在性阈值，以及Sobolev不等式在超临界和临界情形下极值函数的存在性。
AI.result: 对于删除有限边的图：存在阈值α_G∈[0,∞)，当a<α_G时不存在归一化解，当a>α_G时存在归一化解。对于Sobolev超临界情形存在极值函数，临界情形存在特定图使极值可达。对于添加有限边的图：存在特定边集E'和a_1，当a>a_1时不存在归一化解，且存在特定E'使极值函数不存在。
AI.conclusion: 图结构的微小扰动（添加或删除有限边）对约束变分问题的解存在性有显著影响。删除边时存在阈值现象，添加边时可能导致解完全不存在，这揭示了图拓扑结构在变分问题中的关键作用。

title: Spectral Theory of Fractional Cooperative Systems and Threshold Dynamics in Epidemic Models
summary:
Spectral analysis has long been recognized as a fundamental tool for studying the existence, uniqueness, and qualitative behavior of solutions to semilinear elliptic and parabolic equations, as well as their long-time dynamics. In modern mathematics, fractional Laplacians are widely used to model nonlocal or long-range diffusion processes arising in biology, including anomalous movement, long-distance dispersal, and Levy-flight migration of organisms, cells, and epidemics.
  In this paper, we employ the spectral fractional Laplacian introduced by Caffarelli and Stinga (2016) to develop the eigentheory for a cooperative system describing an infectious epidemic process and to analyze its long-term behavior. Using Fredholm theory and related analytical techniques, building in part on ideas of Lam and Lou (2016), we establish a sharp criterion ensuring the existence and simplicity of the principal eigenvalue, together with variational characterizations and consequences for the validity of maximum principles. We further derive the asymptotic behavior of the principal eigenvalue with respect to diffusion coefficients, fractional orders, and domain scaling, complementing recent developments by Zhao and Ruan (2023) and Feng, Li, Ruan, and Xin (2024).
  As an application of this spectral framework, we prove the existence, uniqueness, and threshold-type long-time dynamics of solutions to an endemic reaction-diffusion system with fractional diffusion, providing a perspective that differs from earlier approaches such as Hsu and Yang (2013). Our results contribute to the growing interaction between spectral theory and nonlocal analysis, in line with recent advances in the area.

AI.tldr: 该论文利用谱分数拉普拉斯算子建立传染病模型的谱理论，分析主特征值性质及其渐近行为，并应用于分数扩散的流行病反应-扩散系统的长期动力学研究。
AI.motivation: 分数拉普拉斯算子广泛用于建模生物学中的非局部扩散过程（如异常运动、长距离扩散、Levy飞行迁移）。需要建立传染病合作系统的谱理论来分析其长期行为，补充现有研究不足。
AI.method: 采用Caffarelli和Stinga（2016）提出的谱分数拉普拉斯算子，结合Fredholm理论和相关分析技术（借鉴Lam和Lou（2016）的思想），建立主特征值的存在性、简单性判据，给出变分刻画和最大值原理。
AI.result: 建立了主特征值存在性和简单性的尖锐判据，获得了主特征值关于扩散系数、分数阶数和区域尺度的渐近行为，并将谱框架应用于分数扩散的流行病反应-扩散系统，证明了解的存在性、唯一性和阈值型长期动力学。
AI.conclusion: 该研究发展了传染病模型的谱理论，为分数扩散流行病系统提供了新的分析视角，促进了谱理论与非局部分析的交叉融合，补充了Hsu和Yang（2013）等早期方法。

title: Stability and instability of a one-dimensional MHD model
summary: We consider a one-dimensional magnetohydrodynamics model introduced by Dai \textit{et al.}~(2023), in a parameter regime where, in the absence of a magnetic field, the system reduces to the De Gregorio model for the Euler equations. We analyze stability and instability near the first excited state on the torus, thus generalizing the recent results obtained by Guo and Jiu~(2025) for the De Gregorio model. Specifically, we establish global well-posedness of the linearized system, local well-posedness for the nonlinear system, and demonstrate both linear and nonlinear instability for a broad class of initial data in the weighted Sobolev space introduced by Lai \textit{et al.}~(2020). We identify the principal linearized operator, which is structurally equivalent to that of the De Gregorio model, as the primary mechanism of instability. Moreover, we prove global well-posedness and stability of both linear and nonlinear systems for initial data in a particular subspace of the aforementioned weighted Sobolev space.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了Dai等人(2023)提出的一维磁流体动力学模型在特定参数区域下的稳定性与不稳定性，推广了Guo和Jiu(2025)对De Gregorio模型的研究结果。
AI.motivation: 研究磁流体动力学模型在特定参数区域下的稳定性问题，该区域在无磁场时退化为Euler方程的De Gregorio模型。旨在推广Guo和Jiu(2025)对De Gregorio模型的研究结果到更一般的磁流体动力学情形。
AI.method: 在环面上分析接近第一激发态的稳定性与不稳定性。建立线性化系统的全局适定性、非线性系统的局部适定性，并在Lai等人(2020)引入的加权Sobolev空间中证明线性和非线性不稳定性。识别主线性化算子作为不稳定性的主要机制。
AI.result: 证明了线性化系统的全局适定性、非线性系统的局部适定性，并展示了大类初始数据在线性和非线性意义下的不稳定性。同时证明了在特定加权Sobolev子空间中，线性和非线性系统的全局适定性和稳定性。
AI.conclusion: 该磁流体动力学模型在特定参数区域下表现出与De Gregorio模型相似的不稳定性机制。主线性化算子在结构上与De Gregorio模型等价，是不稳定性的主要来源。然而，在特定的加权Sobolev子空间中，系统保持稳定。

title: Long time smooth solutions of 2-D quadratic quasilinear wave equations in exterior domains with Neumann boundary conditions
summary: For the 3-D quadratic quasilinear wave equations in exterior domains with Dirichlet or Neumann boundary conditions, the global existence or the maximal existence time of small data smooth solutions have been established in the past. However, so far it is still open for the corresponding 2-D Neumann boundary value problem. In this paper, we investigate the long time existence of small data solutions to 2-D quadratic quasilinear wave equations with homogeneous Neumann boundary values. Our main ingredients include: establishing some new pointwise spacetime decay estimates for the 2-D initial boundary value problem of the divergence form wave equations, and introducing a series of good unknowns to derive the required energy estimates. The obtained results can be directly applied to the initial boundary value problem of 2-D isentropic and irrotational compressible Euler equations for both the polytropic gases and the Chaplygin gases in exterior domains with impermeable conditions, the 2-D relativistic membrane equations and 2-D membrane equations with homogeneous Neumann boundary values.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了二维二次拟线性波动方程在Neumann边界条件下的长时间存在性问题，填补了该领域的研究空白。
AI.motivation: 过去已建立了三维二次拟线性波动方程在外区域Dirichlet或Neumann边界条件下小数据光滑解的全局存在性或最大存在时间，但相应的二维Neumann边值问题仍是一个开放问题。
AI.method: 主要方法包括：建立二维散度形式波动方程初边值问题的一些新的点状时空衰减估计，并引入一系列好的未知量来推导所需的能量估计。
AI.result: 获得了二维二次拟线性波动方程在齐次Neumann边界条件下小数据解的长时间存在性结果。
AI.conclusion: 所得结果可直接应用于二维等熵无旋可压缩Euler方程（多原子气体和Chaplygin气体）在外区域不可渗透条件下的初边值问题，以及二维相对论膜方程和二维膜方程的齐次Neumann边值问题。

title: Interior Hessian estimates for Hessian quotient equations in dimension three
summary: In this paper, we establish the interior Hessian estimates for $2$-convex solutions to $\frac{σ_2}{σ_1} (D^2 u) = ψ(x,u)$ in dimension three. In higher dimensions ($n \geq 4$), we prove the interior Hessian estimates for semi-convex solutions. We provide a new method to prove the doubling inequality for smooth solutions in dimensions three and four. In higher dimensions ($n\geq 5$) the doubling inequality is proved under an additional dynamic semi-convexity condition which is the same to that in \cite{SY2025}. The method also applies to the equation $σ_2 (D^2 u) = ψ(x, u, \nabla u)$.

AI.tldr: 本文建立了三维空间中2-凸解和更高维空间中半凸解的Hessian内估计，并提出了证明三、四维光滑解加倍不等式的新方法，在更高维中需额外动态半凸条件。
AI.motivation: 研究偏微分方程中Hessian估计问题，特别是对于σ2/σ1型方程和σ2型方程，这些方程在几何分析和完全非线性椭圆方程理论中具有重要意义。需要建立解的Hessian内估计和加倍不等式，这是分析解正则性和存在性的关键工具。
AI.method: 1. 针对三维空间中的2-凸解和更高维空间中的半凸解，建立了Hessian内估计；2. 提出了证明三、四维光滑解加倍不等式的新方法；3. 在五维及以上维度，在额外动态半凸条件下证明加倍不等式；4. 方法也适用于σ2(D²u)=ψ(x,u,∇u)型方程。
AI.result: 1. 成功建立了三维空间中2-凸解和更高维空间中半凸解的Hessian内估计；2. 为三、四维光滑解提供了新的加倍不等式证明方法；3. 在五维及以上维度，在动态半凸条件下证明了加倍不等式；4. 方法具有普适性，可推广到更一般的方程类型。
AI.conclusion: 本文发展了一套新的方法来处理完全非线性椭圆方程的Hessian估计和加倍不等式问题，在三维和四维取得了无条件结果，在更高维需要额外凸性条件，为相关方程的正则性理论提供了重要工具。

title: Existence for the Discrete Nonlinear Fragmentation Equation with Degenerate Diffusion
summary: A mathematical model for the discrete nonlinear fragmentation (collision-induced breakage) equation with diffusion is studied. The existence of global weak solutions is established in arbitrary spatial dimensions without assuming a strictly positive lower bound on the diffusion coefficients, extending previous results that were restricted to one-dimensional domains and relied on uniformly positive diffusion. The analysis is carried out under boundedness assumptions on the collision and breakage kernels. The proof is based on the construction of a suitable regularized system, combined with weak $L^2$ a priori estimates and compactness arguments in $L^1$, which allow the passage to the limit in the nonlinear fragmentation operator.

AI.tldr: 研究具有扩散的离散非线性破碎方程，建立了任意空间维度下全局弱解的存在性，无需扩散系数严格正下界。
AI.motivation: 先前研究局限于一维域且要求扩散系数严格正，本文旨在克服这些限制，在更一般条件下建立解的存在性理论。
AI.method: 通过构造正则化系统，结合弱L^2先验估计和L^1紧性论证，处理非线性破碎算子的极限过程。
AI.result: 在碰撞和破碎核的有界性假设下，证明了任意空间维度中全局弱解的存在性，无需扩散系数严格正下界。
AI.conclusion: 成功扩展了离散非线性破碎方程的理论框架，为更广泛的应用场景提供了数学基础。

title: Liouville theorems for conformal $Q$-curvature equations
summary: In this paper, we study the non-existence of positive solutions for the following conformal $Q$-curvature equation \begin{equation*} (-Δ)^σu = K(x) u^{\frac{n+2σ}{n-2σ}} \quad \text{in } \mathbb{R}^n, \end{equation*} where $ σ\in (0, n/2)$ is a real number. When $σ=1$, this equation reduces to the well-known scalar curvature equation arising from the prescribed scalar curvature problem. For general $σ\in (0, n/2)$, it appears in the study of prescribing $Q$-curvature. We establish Liouville theorems under various assumptions on the $Q$-curvature $K(x)$ by developing a unified approach applicable to all $σ\in (0, n/2)$. Our method successfully addresses the challenges posed by the absence of ODE tools in the fractional regime and the lack of a classification of Delaunay-type singular solutions for the general fractional Yamabe equation.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了分数阶Q-曲率方程正解的不存在性，建立了在不同Q-曲率假设下的Liouville定理，发展了一个适用于所有分数阶的统一方法。
AI.motivation: 研究分数阶Q-曲率方程正解的不存在性，该方程在σ=1时退化为经典的标量曲率方程，在一般σ∈(0,n/2)时出现在Q-曲率规定问题中。需要克服分数阶领域缺乏ODE工具和一般分数阶Yamabe方程Delaunay型奇异解分类的挑战。
AI.method: 发展了一个适用于所有σ∈(0,n/2)的统一方法，成功解决了分数阶领域缺乏ODE工具和一般分数阶Yamabe方程Delaunay型奇异解分类的挑战。
AI.result: 建立了在不同Q-曲率假设下的Liouville定理，证明了分数阶Q-曲率方程正解的不存在性。
AI.conclusion: 本文发展了一个统一的方法来处理分数阶Q-曲率方程，克服了分数阶领域的特殊困难，为研究这类方程的正解不存在性提供了有效的工具。

title: Oblique wave interactions in 2D steady supersonic flows of Bethe-Zel'dovich-Thompson fluids
summary: This paper studies steady supersonic flow in a 2D semi-infinite divergent duct. We assume that the flow satisfies the slip boundary condition on the walls of the duct, and the state of the flow is given at the inlet of the divergent duct. When the fluid is a polytropic ideal gas, the problem can be reduced to some interactions of rarefaction simple waves, and the existence of a global classical solution inside the divergent duct can be established using the method of characteristics. In this paper we assume that the fluid is a nonconvex Bethe-Zel'dovich-Thompson (BZT) fluid. This type of fluid may significantly differ from polytropic ideal gases. For instance, physically admissible rarefaction shocks can occur. Depending on the oncoming flow state and the flare angles of the divergent duct, thirteen distinct types of oblique wave interactions may occur, including oblique composite waves consisting of shocks and centered simple waves. This paper systematically studies these oblique wave interactions and constructs global, piecewise smooth, supersonic solutions within the divergent duct using characteristic decomposition and hodograph transformation methods. We also obtain the detailed structures of these solutions in addition to their existence. The results and methods of this paper are also applicable to some 2D Riemann problems for gases with nonconvex equations of state.

AI.tldr: 研究非凸BZT流体在二维半无限扩张管道中的定常超声速流动，系统分析十三种斜波相互作用类型，构建全局分段光滑解
AI.motivation: 传统研究多针对多方理想气体，但非凸BZT流体具有显著不同特性（如可能出现物理可接受的稀疏激波），需要系统研究其在扩张管道中的复杂波相互作用
AI.method: 使用特征线分解法和速端图变换方法，分析斜波相互作用（包括激波与中心简单波组成的复合波），构建全局分段光滑解
AI.result: 确定了十三种不同的斜波相互作用类型，成功构建了扩张管道内的全局分段光滑超声速解，并详细描述了这些解的结构特征
AI.conclusion: 非凸BZT流体在扩张管道中的流动比多方理想气体复杂得多，本文建立的波相互作用分析和求解方法也适用于非凸状态方程气体的二维黎曼问题

title: Logarithmic Sobolev, Poincaré and Beckner Inequalities on Hyperbolic Spaces and Riemannian Manifolds
summary: We investigate several functional and geometric inequalities on the hyperbolic space $\mathbb{H}^N$, with a primary emphasis on logarithmic Sobolev inequalities, Poincaré inequalities, and Beckner-type inequalities, all studied within the framework of the AB program. The main analytical tool employed throughout this paper is symmetrization. More precisely, our approach relies on an improved version of the Pólya-Szegö inequality on the hyperbolic space, obtained through a careful comparison of the gradient norms of rearranged functions in the hyperbolic and Euclidean settings. For Beckner-type inequalities, we adopt a semigroup approach based on sharp estimates for the heat semigroup, leading to refined interpolation inequalities between Poincaré and logarithmic Sobolev inequalities. Finally, we extend our results beyond hyperbolic space to a class of Riemannian model manifolds $\mathbb{M}^N$ satisfying the centered isoperimetric inequality. This shows that the inequalities and methods developed in this work are robust and rely mainly on geometric and isoperimetric properties, rather than on the specific structure of hyperbolic space itself.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了双曲空间上的函数与几何不等式，包括对数Sobolev不等式、Poincaré不等式和Beckner型不等式，采用AB程序框架和对称化方法，并将结果推广到满足中心等周不等式的黎曼模型流形。
AI.motivation: 研究双曲空间上的函数与几何不等式，探索在AB程序框架下对数Sobolev不等式、Poincaré不等式和Beckner型不等式的性质与关系，并验证这些结果是否依赖于双曲空间的具体结构还是更一般的几何性质。
AI.method: 主要采用对称化方法，特别是改进的双曲空间上的Pólya-Szegö不等式，通过比较双曲和欧几里得空间中重排函数的梯度范数。对于Beckner型不等式，采用基于热半群锐估计的半群方法，得到Poincaré和对数Sobolev不等式之间的精细插值不等式。
AI.result: 建立了双曲空间上的一系列函数不等式，并将结果推广到满足中心等周不等式的黎曼模型流形类，表明所发展的不等式和方法具有鲁棒性，主要依赖于几何和等周性质而非双曲空间的具体结构。
AI.conclusion: 本文发展的不等式和方法具有普适性，主要依赖于几何和等周性质，可应用于更广泛的黎曼模型流形，为研究非欧几里得空间上的函数分析提供了有力工具。

title: Nonlocal logistics and nonlinear productions in an attraction-repulsion chemotaxis model: analysis of the global well-posedness

AI.tldr: 本文研究了一个包含吸引和排斥效应以及非局部逻辑型源项的三分量趋化系统，证明了在适当的参数平衡条件下，系统存在全局有界的经典解。
AI.motivation: 研究同时包含吸引和排斥化学信号的三分量趋化系统，探讨非局部阻尼项如何防止奇异性形成，扩展了之前仅考虑吸引效应的研究。
AI.method: 建立数学模型描述细胞分布(u)、吸引化学信号(v)和排斥化学信号(w)的相互作用，考虑椭圆型(τ=0)和抛物型(τ=1)两种情况，通过分析信号产生指数ℓ,ρ与非局部阻尼指数α,β之间的平衡关系。
AI.result: 证明了在适当的参数平衡条件下，对于足够光滑的初始数据和零通量边界条件，系统存在全局有界的经典解，充分强的非局部阻尼可以防止时间奇异性形成。
AI.conclusion: 该研究扩展了之前仅考虑吸引效应的结果，证明了在同时包含吸引和排斥效应的三分量趋化系统中，适当的非局部阻尼可以确保解的全局存在性和有界性。

title: Partial regularity of the gradient for subsolutions
summary: We prove that the gradient of any bounded subharmonic function is upper semi-continuous, provided that its super-level sets can be touched from the exterior by uniform $C^{1,\text{Dini}}$ domains at every point. This idea extends to a class of general operators, as well as to the boundary behaviour of the gradient of solutions of the Dirichlet problem in a domain whose boundary satisfy this geometric condition.

AI.tldr: 证明了有界次调和函数的梯度在满足特定几何条件下是上半连续的，这一结果可推广到一类一般算子及Dirichlet问题解的边界行为
AI.motivation: 研究次调和函数及其梯度的正则性，特别是在边界处的行为，这对于理解偏微分方程解的性质具有重要意义
AI.method: 利用几何分析方法，要求超水平集在每一点都能从外部被一致C^{1,Dini}区域接触，从而证明梯度的上半连续性
AI.result: 证明了有界次调和函数的梯度在给定几何条件下是上半连续的，这一结果可推广到更一般的算子和Dirichlet问题的边界行为
AI.conclusion: 通过引入特定的几何条件（边界能被一致C^{1,Dini}区域从外部接触），建立了次调和函数及其梯度正则性的新结果，为相关领域提供了理论工具

title: Observability and Semiclassical Control for Schrödinger Equations on Non-compact Hyperbolic Surfaces
summary: We study the observability of the Schrödinger equation on $X$, a non-compact covering space of a compact hyperbolic surface $M$. Using a generalized Bloch theory, functions on $X$ are identified as sections of flat Hilbert bundles over $M$. We develop a semiclassical analysis framework for such bundles and generalize the result of semiclassical control estimates in [Dyatlov and Jin, Acta Math., 220 (2018), pp. 297-339] to all flat Hilbert bundles over $M$, with uniform constants with respect to the choice of bundle. Furthermore, when the Riemannian cover $X \to M$ is a normal cover with a virtually Abelian deck transformation group $Γ$, we combine the uniform semiclassical control estimates on flat Hilbert bundles with the generalized Bloch theory to derive observability from any $Γ$-periodic open subsets of $X$. We also discuss applications of the uniform semiclassical control estimates in spectral geometry.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了非紧覆盖空间上薛定谔方程的可观性，发展了半经典分析框架，证明了所有平坦希尔伯特丛上的均匀控制估计，并应用于谱几何。
AI.motivation: 研究非紧覆盖空间上薛定谔方程的可观性，扩展半经典分析到平坦希尔伯特丛，建立与谱几何的联系。
AI.method: 使用广义Bloch理论将函数识别为平坦希尔伯特丛的截面，发展半经典分析框架，推广Dyatlov和Jin的控制估计到所有平坦希尔伯特丛，结合广义Bloch理论和均匀控制估计推导可观性。
AI.result: 建立了所有平坦希尔伯特丛上的均匀半经典控制估计（常数与丛的选择无关），当覆盖是正规覆盖且deck变换群是虚拟Abelian时，从任何Γ周期开子集推导出可观性。
AI.conclusion: 成功将半经典控制估计推广到所有平坦希尔伯特丛，建立了可观性结果，并展示了在谱几何中的应用潜力。

title: Existence and nonexistence of solutions for fractional elliptic equations arising from closed MEMS model
summary: The objective of our paper is to investigate fractional elliptic equations of the form $(-Δ)^s u=\frac{λ}{(a-u)^2}$ within a bounded domain $Ω$, subject to zero Dirichlet boundary conditions. Here, $s\in(0,1)$, $λ>0$, and the function $a$ vanishes at the boundary while satisfying additional conditions. This problem originates from Micro-Electromechanical Systems (MEMS) devices, particularly when the elastic membrane makes contact with the ground plate at the boundary. We establish both existence and nonexistence results, illustrating how the boundary decay of the membrane influences the solutions and pull-in voltage.

AI.tldr: 研究分数阶椭圆方程(-Δ)^s u=λ/(a-u)^2在边界条件a=0时的存在性与不存在性，该方程源于MEMS器件中弹性膜与接地板的接触问题
AI.motivation: 该问题源于微机电系统(MEMS)器件，特别是当弹性膜在边界处与接地板接触时。研究边界衰减对解和pull-in电压的影响具有实际物理意义。
AI.method: 研究分数阶椭圆方程(-Δ)^s u=λ/(a-u)^2在边界条件a=0时的数学分析，建立存在性和不存在性结果
AI.result: 建立了存在性和不存在性结果，展示了膜的边界衰减如何影响解和pull-in电压
AI.conclusion: 分数阶椭圆方程在MEMS器件中的应用揭示了边界衰减对解行为的重要影响，为理解这类物理系统提供了数学基础

title: The small Deborah number limit for the compressible fluid-particle flows
summary: In this paper, we consider the hydrodynamic limit for the fluid-particle flows governed by the Vlasov-Fokker-Planck equation coupled with the compressible Navier-Stokes equation as the Deborah number tends to zero. The limit is valid globally in time provided that the initial perturbation is small in a neighborhood of a steady state. The proof is based on a formal derivation via the Hilbert expansion around the limiting system, the rigorous justification of which is completed by the refined energy estimates involving the macro-micro decomposition. Compared with the existing results obtained by the relative entropy argument([A. Mellet and A. F. Vasseur, Comm. Math. Phys., 281 (2008), pp. 573--596]), the present work provides a stronger pointwise convergence of the hydrodynamic limits with an explicit rate for the fluid-particle coupled model.

AI.tldr: 研究Vlasov-Fokker-Planck方程与可压缩Navier-Stokes方程耦合的流体-粒子流动，当Deborah数趋于零时的流体动力学极限，证明了全局时间内的收敛性。
AI.motivation: 研究流体-粒子耦合模型在Deborah数趋于零时的流体动力学极限问题，旨在获得比现有相对熵方法更强的收敛结果，包括点态收敛和显式收敛速率。
AI.method: 采用Hilbert展开对极限系统进行形式推导，通过宏观-微观分解的精细能量估计完成严格证明，与现有的相对熵方法相比提供了更强的收敛性分析。
AI.result: 证明了当初始扰动在稳态邻域内足够小时，流体动力学极限在全局时间内成立，获得了比相对熵方法更强的点态收敛性，并给出了显式收敛速率。
AI.conclusion: 本文为流体-粒子耦合模型提供了更强的流体动力学极限收敛结果，包括点态收敛和显式收敛速率，改进了现有相对熵方法只能获得弱收敛的局限性。

title: Magnetic Neumann problems with Aharonov-Bohm potentials: boundary asymptotics of eigenvalues and splitting phenomena
summary: We study a planar magnetic Schrödinger operator with an Aharonov-Bohm vector potential, under Neumann boundary conditions. Through a gauge transformation, the corresponding eigenvalue problem can be formulated in terms of the Laplacian on a fractured domain, where the fracture lies along the segment connecting the pole to its projection on the boundary. As the pole approaches the boundary, we prove that the eigenvalues converge to those of the Neumann Laplacian and the variation exhibits a logarithmic vanishing rate. In the case of multiple eigenvalues, when the pole approaches a fixed point of the boundary, we observe a splitting phenomenon, with the largest branch separating from the others.

AI.tldr: 研究平面磁薛定谔算子在Aharonov-Bohm矢势和诺伊曼边界条件下的特征值行为，当极点趋近边界时，特征值收敛于诺伊曼拉普拉斯算子的特征值，且变化率呈对数衰减。
AI.motivation: 研究磁薛定谔算子在Aharonov-Bohm矢势下的特征值问题，特别关注当极点位置变化时特征值的渐近行为，这对于理解量子力学中磁通量对系统能谱的影响具有重要意义。
AI.method: 通过规范变换将问题转化为断裂区域上的拉普拉斯算子特征值问题，其中断裂沿着极点与其在边界上投影的连线。分析当极点趋近边界时特征值的收敛行为。
AI.result: 证明当极点趋近边界时，特征值收敛于诺伊曼拉普拉斯算子的特征值，且变化率呈对数衰减。对于多重特征值情况，当极点趋近边界固定点时，观察到分裂现象，最大分支与其他分支分离。
AI.conclusion: Aharonov-Bohm矢势下的磁薛定谔算子在极点趋近边界时，其特征值行为呈现对数衰减的收敛性，多重特征值会出现分裂现象，这为理解量子系统中磁通量效应提供了新的数学洞察。

title: On the first eigenvalue of a nonlinear Schrödinger type equation
summary:
We consider an eigenvalue problem for the generalized nonlinear Schrödinger type operator with the Robin boundary condition as given below.  egin{equation*} \label{ab-Robin p-Laplace evp with potential term_intro} \left\{  egin{split} -Δ_p u+V(x)|u|^{p-2}u&=λ|u|^{p-2}u\quad &&\mathrm{in} ~Ω,\ |
abla u|^{p-2} rac{\partial u}{\partialη}+β|u|^{p-2}u&=0\quad &&\mathrm{on}~\partialΩ, \end{split} ight. \end{equation*} where $Δ_p u := \operatorname{div}(|
abla u|^{p-2}
abla u)$ is the $p$-Laplace operator, $Ω$ is a bounded domain in $\mathbb{R}^n$ with smooth boundary, $V \in C^1(\mathbb{R}^n),$ $ η$ denotes the outward unit normal, and $ β$ is a positive real constant. We study the properties of its first eigenvalue with respect to the potential $V$, the boundary parameter $β$ as well as the domain. First, we establish some properties of the smallest eigenvalue $λ_1(V)$ with respect to the potential. We then prove the differentiability of $λ_1(V)$ with respect to the Robin boundary parameter $β$ and give an explicit formula for this derivative, which is then used to investigate some monotonicity properties of $λ_1(V).$ We also obtain a shape derivative formula for the smallest eigenvalue. Using these derivatives, we also study domain monotonicity properties of the first eigenvalue.

AI.tldr: 研究带Robin边界条件的广义非线性Schrödinger型算子的第一特征值性质，包括关于势能V、边界参数β和区域Ω的依赖关系
AI.motivation: 研究p-Laplace算子带Robin边界条件的特征值问题，探索第一特征值如何依赖于势能函数、边界参数和区域形状，为理解这类非线性椭圆算子的谱性质提供理论基础
AI.method: 建立第一特征值λ₁(V)关于势能V的性质，证明λ₁(V)关于边界参数β的可微性并给出显式导数公式，推导形状导数公式，利用这些导数研究特征值的单调性
AI.result: 获得了第一特征值关于势能V的若干性质，证明了λ₁(V)关于β的可微性并给出了显式导数公式，得到了形状导数公式，并利用这些导数研究了特征值的单调性
AI.conclusion: 系统地建立了带Robin边界条件的p-Laplace算子第一特征值关于势能、边界参数和区域的依赖关系，为这类非线性特征值问题的分析提供了重要工具

title: Feedback Stabilization and Tracking for Heat Equations Using Thermo-Plasmonic Nanoparticles as Actuators
summary: We propose a feedback strategy to track prescribed heat profiles using plasmonic nanoparticles as actuators. Starting from a thermo--plasmonic Maxwell--heat model, we use a time-domain discrete effective description in which the generated heat is approximated by a superposition of heat kernels centered at particle locations with amplitudes governed by a coupled Volterra system. We recast this dynamics as a heat equation on a bounded domain with finitely many point actuators and design a tracking feedback based on pointwise evaluations of $\mathcal A^{-1}y$, where $\mathcal A=I-A_0$ and $A_0$ is the Neumann diffusion operator. Working in the natural $V'$ setting with $V=D(\mathcal A)$, we prove exponential stabilization of the tracking error via distribution-actuator theory. For non-equilibrium reference profiles, we add a constant feedforward term and a low-mode fixed-point pre-compensation on $X_N$, ensuring exact steady matching on $X_N$ and an explicit bound on the residual tail mismatch.

AI.tldr: 提出一种基于反馈策略的追踪方法，利用等离子体纳米粒子作为执行器追踪预设热分布。通过将热方程与点执行器模型结合，设计反馈控制实现指数稳定跟踪。
AI.motivation: 需要精确控制热分布，特别是在使用等离子体纳米粒子作为热源的场景中。传统方法难以实现精确的热分布追踪，特别是在非平衡参考分布情况下。
AI.method: 1. 从热-等离子体麦克斯韦-热模型出发，使用时域离散有效描述；2. 将生成的热近似为以粒子位置为中心的热核叠加；3. 将动力学重写为有界域上的热方程，具有有限个点执行器；4. 设计基于点评估的跟踪反馈；5. 对于非平衡参考分布，添加恒定前馈项和低模固定点预补偿。
AI.result: 在自然V'设置下，通过分布执行器理论证明了跟踪误差的指数稳定化。对于非平衡参考分布，确保在X_N上的精确稳态匹配，并对剩余尾部失配提供明确界限。
AI.conclusion: 提出的反馈策略能够有效追踪预设热分布，通过等离子体纳米粒子作为执行器实现精确控制，特别是在非平衡情况下也能保证良好的跟踪性能。

title: Kernel estimates and weak (1,1)-boundedness of pseudo-differential operators on compact Lie groups
summary:
Given a compact Lie group $G$ and its unitary dual $\widehat{G}$, we establish the weak (1,1) continuity for pseudo-differential operators in the global Hörmander classes of order $-n(1-ρ)/2$ on $G	imes \widehat{G}$. Our approach consists of proving suitable estimates for the kernel of such operators. Furthermore, we use these kernel estimates to give an alternative proof for the $H^1(G)$-$L^1(G)$-continuity of these classes now allowing the full range $0\leqδ\leqρ\leq1, \;ρ
eq0,\;δ
eq1$. The conditions for the operators are formulated using the Hörmander classes $S^m_{ρ,δ}(G):=S^m_{ρ,δ}(G	imes \widehat{G})$ of symbols in the non-commutative phase space $G	imes \widehat{G}$, which are extensions of the well-known $(ρ,δ)$-classes in the Euclidean space. Our results are formulated in the complete range $0\leq δ\leq ρ\leq 1,$ $ρ
eq0,\;$$δ
eq 1$.
  As an application of this boundedness result we provide end-point a-priori $L^1$-estimates for the sub-Laplacian $\mathcal{L}_{sub}=X^2+Y^2,$ and for the heat type operator $T=Z-X^2-Y^2$ on $SU(2)\cong \mathbb{S}^3$ that cannot be obtained by application of the standard pseudo-differential calculus due to Hörmander. More precisely, we prove that if one considers the subelliptic problem,
   egin{equation}\label{IVP:abstract}  egin{cases}Tu=f ,& 	ext{ } \u,f\in \mathscr{D}'(SU(2)):=(C^\infty(SU(2)))', & 	ext{ } \end{cases} \end{equation} then, for $f\in W^{1,- rac{1}{4}}(SU(2)),$ one has that $u\in L^{1,\infty}(SU(2)).$

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了紧李群上伪微分算子在全局Hörmander类中的弱(1,1)连续性，并应用于SU(2)上的亚椭圆算子和热型算子的端点L^1估计。
AI.motivation: 研究紧李群上伪微分算子的端点有界性，特别是弱(1,1)连续性，这对于理解非交换相空间中的算子理论具有重要意义。传统的Hörmander伪微分演算无法处理某些亚椭圆问题，需要新的方法。
AI.method: 通过证明全局Hörmander类中伪微分算子核的适当估计，建立弱(1,1)连续性。利用这些核估计给出H^1(G)-L^1(G)连续性的替代证明。将结果应用于SU(2)上的亚Laplacian和热型算子。
AI.result: 证明了在完整参数范围0≤δ≤ρ≤1, ρ≠0, δ≠1下，伪微分算子在紧李群上的弱(1,1)连续性。获得了SU(2)上亚椭圆算子的端点L^1估计：若f∈W^{1,-1/4}(SU(2))，则u∈L^{1,∞}(SU(2))。
AI.conclusion: 该研究扩展了紧李群上伪微分算子的有界性理论，提供了处理传统Hörmander演算无法解决的亚椭圆问题的新工具，在非交换相空间中建立了完整的端点估计框架。

title: Morrey estimates for the gradient in non-linear variational transmission problems
summary:
We study a class of variational transmission problems driven by nonlinear energies with discontinuous coefficients across a prescribed interface. The model setting consists of integral functionals of the form \[ \mathcal{F}(u;E)=\int_Ωσ_E(x)\,F(\nabla u)\,dx, \] where the coefficient $σ_E$ takes two constant values on complementary regions separated by a $C^1$ hypersurface, and the integrand $F$ satisfies standard $p$-growth and monotonicity conditions with $p>2$.
  In this nonlinear variational framework, we establish local Morrey-space regularity for the gradient of local minimizers, proving that $\nabla u\in L^{2,λ}_{\mathrm{loc}}(Ω)$ for every $0\leqλ<n$, provided $2<p<\frac{2n}{n-2}$. The proof is based on quantitative decay estimates for the energy near the interface, first obtained in a flat configuration and then extended to the general case by a suitable approximation argument.

AI.tldr: 研究具有间断系数的非线性变分传输问题，证明了当2<p<2n/(n-2)时，局部极小值解的梯度具有局部Morrey空间正则性。
AI.motivation: 研究在预设界面处系数不连续的非线性变分问题，这类问题在材料科学、界面现象等实际应用中常见，需要理解解的正则性行为。
AI.method: 通过建立界面附近能量的定量衰减估计，首先在平坦配置中证明，然后通过适当的逼近论证扩展到一般情况。
AI.result: 证明了局部极小值解的梯度∇u属于局部Morrey空间L^{2,λ}_{loc}(Ω)，对于所有0≤λ<n，条件是2<p<2n/(n-2)。
AI.conclusion: 在非线性变分框架下，即使系数在界面上不连续，局部极小值解仍能保持较好的正则性，这扩展了相关理论结果。

title: On the kinetic equation arising from the large-scale limit of the Cucker-Smale model
summary: We propose a large-scale scaling viewpoint for deriving mesoscopic dynamics from interacting particle systems and apply it to the Cucker--Smale flocking model. In contrast with the classical mean-field regime leading to the Vlasov-type Cucker--Smale equation with spatially nonlocal (convolution) alignment force, our scaling yields a kinetic equation whose alignment field becomes local in space and nonlocal only in velocity. For the spatially homogeneous case, we obtain an explicit solution and derive quantitative flocking rates. For the spatially inhomogeneous equation we establish a local well-posedness in $W^{1,\infty}$ and in $C_b^{1,α}$, highlighting the additional difficulties caused by the absence of a convolution structure. Moreover, for sufficiently small interaction strength we present a global well-posedness and a forward-in-time $L^1$ asymptotic completeness property. Finally, we investigate mono-kinetic solutions and exhibit finite-time blow-up scenarios.

AI.tldr: 论文提出了一种大规模尺度化方法，从相互作用粒子系统推导介观动力学，应用于Cucker-Smale集群模型，得到空间局部、速度非局部的动力学方程，研究了齐次/非齐次解、适定性及有限时间爆破等性质。
AI.motivation: 传统平均场极限得到具有空间非局部（卷积）对齐力的Vlasov型Cucker-Smale方程，本文旨在通过不同的尺度化方法获得空间局部化、仅速度非局部的动力学方程，以探索不同的介观动力学行为。
AI.method: 采用大规模尺度化方法，从Cucker-Smale粒子系统推导介观动力学方程。对于空间齐次情况获得显式解；对于非齐次情况，在W^{1,∞}和C_b^{1,α}空间中建立局部适定性；对小相互作用强度建立全局适定性和L^1渐近完备性；研究单动理解并展示有限时间爆破场景。
AI.result: 1. 得到空间局部、速度非局部的动力学方程；2. 空间齐次情况下获得显式解和定量集群速率；3. 空间非齐次情况下建立局部适定性；4. 小相互作用强度下证明全局适定性和L^1渐近完备性；5. 发现单动理解存在有限时间爆破现象。
AI.conclusion: 大规模尺度化方法为从粒子系统推导介观动力学提供了新视角，得到的空间局部化方程在数学分析上具有挑战性，但展示了丰富的动力学行为，包括集群、适定性和爆破现象，为理解集体行为提供了新框架。

title: Matching conditions for scattering solutions of scalar wave equations on extremal Reissner-Nordström spacetimes
summary: We study scattering solutions $φ$ of the linear wave equation on extremal Reissner-Nordström spacetimes, satisfying the following properties: i) $φ$ attains a prescribed radiation field $ψ_{\mathcal{I}}$ through future null infinity, which decays at an inverse polynomial rate; ii) $φ$ is regular in the exterior region up to and including the future event horizon, i.e. $φ\in C^N$, where $N\gg1$ is independent of the decay rate of $ψ_{\mathcal{I}}$. We prove that such solutions exist for arbitrary $N$, and that they are not unique. The proof consists of: 1) finding an approximate solution $φ_{\mathrm{app}}$ with fast decaying error; 2) the use of backwards energy estimates in order to correct $φ_{\mathrm{app}}$ to an exact solution. Extremality is used only in the second step. The methods of the linear case described above are then used to show the same results for semilinear equations where the nonlinearity satisfies the null condition, as well as to geometries describing the hyperbolic orbit of multiple extremal Reissner-Nordström black holes.

AI.tldr: 研究极端Reissner-Nordström时空中线性波方程散射解的存在性和非唯一性，并推广到满足零条件的半线性方程及多黑洞轨道几何
AI.motivation: 研究极端Reissner-Nordström黑洞时空中波方程的散射问题，特别是解在事件视界处的正则性和未来零无穷远处的辐射场衰减行为之间的关系
AI.method: 1) 构造近似解φ_app使其误差快速衰减；2) 使用反向能量估计将近似解修正为精确解；3) 将线性情况的方法推广到满足零条件的半线性方程和多黑洞轨道几何
AI.result: 证明了对于任意大的N，满足给定辐射场衰减条件和事件视界正则性的解存在且不唯一；极端性仅在第二步证明中需要；方法可推广到半线性方程和多黑洞几何
AI.conclusion: 极端Reissner-Nordström时空中波方程的散射解在保持事件视界高正则性的同时，可以具有任意衰减速率的辐射场，且解不唯一；这一结果对理解黑洞散射理论有重要意义

title: On the Hölder continuity of signed solutions to doubly nonlinear parabolic equations in the mixed degenerate/singular cases
summary: We prove the Hölder continuity of sign-changing solutions to the equation of the type $$\frac{\partial}{\partial t}\big(|u|^{q-1} u\big)- div\Big(|D u|^{p-2}\,D u\Big)=0,$$ where numbers $p$, $q$ satisfy the conditions $$0<q<p-1\quad \text{and}\quad p<2,$$ or $$q>p-1\quad\text{and}\quad p>2.$$ Our proof uses new versions of the integral Harnack type inequalities for sign-changing solutions.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了符号变化解在特定参数条件下的Hölder连续性，使用了新的积分Harnack型不等式。
AI.motivation: 研究一类具有非标准时间导数的非线性抛物方程中符号变化解的Hölder连续性，这类方程在特定参数条件下缺乏标准理论。
AI.method: 通过建立符号变化解的新版本积分Harnack型不等式，利用这些不等式工具证明解的Hölder连续性。
AI.result: 证明了在参数条件0<q<p-1且p<2，或q>p-1且p>2下，方程的符号变化解具有Hölder连续性。
AI.conclusion: 本文为这类具有非标准时间导数的非线性抛物方程的符号变化解提供了正则性理论，扩展了现有结果。

title: Existence of large-data solutions to a thermo-piezoelectric system and forward operator analysis for associated inverse problems
summary:
We consider an inverse problem governed by the initial-boundary value problem for the thermoviscoelastic Kelvin-Voigt system \begin{align*}\left\{ \begin{array}{l} ρ(z,t) u_{tt}- \left(Γ(Θ) u_{zt} +p(z,t) u_z + βΘ_z\right)_z=0\\ b(z,t) Θ_t-\left(k(z,t)Θ_z\right)_z - Γ(Θ) u_{zt}^2+βΘu_{zt}=0, \end{array} \right.
  \end{align*} in an open bounded interval $Ω\subset\mathbb{R}$, for the evolution of the displacement variable $u$, and the temperature $Θ\geq 0$. Assuming the material coefficients $ρ$, $Γ$, $p$, $b$ and $k$ are strictly positive and bounded and $β\in\mathbb{R}$ a global-in-time existence result is established for weak solutions. The present manuscript demonstrates that this can be achieved under energy- and entropy-minimal assumptions, in the sense that global weak solutions are shown to exist for any initial data $$u_0\in W^{1,2}(Ω),\quad u_{0t}\in L^2(Ω)\quad\text{and}\quad 0\leΘ_0\in L^2(Ω).$$ The qualitative analysis of the evolution problem then allows to model and analyze the structural properties of the corresponding forward operator that naturally arises in inverse parameter identification settings. Therein, two modeling approaches of the observation operator as approximations of the electrical surface charge are presented and results on their well-definedness and boundedness are established. With the results on well-definedness and boundedness of the model operator, established in this paper as well, results on well-definedness, boundedness and continuous Fréchet differentiability of the forward operator are presented.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了热粘弹性Kelvin-Voigt系统的逆问题，建立了弱解的全局存在性，并分析了相关正算子的结构性质。
AI.motivation: 研究热粘弹性Kelvin-Voigt系统的逆参数识别问题，在能量和熵最小假设下建立全局弱解的存在性，为逆问题分析提供理论基础。
AI.method: 采用能量-熵最小化方法，在材料系数严格正且有界的条件下，证明系统对任意初始数据存在全局弱解。然后分析正算子的结构性质，包括两种电表面电荷观测算子的建模方法。
AI.result: 证明了在初始数据u0∈W^{1,2}(Ω), u_{0t}∈L^2(Ω), 0≤Θ0∈L^2(Ω)下，系统存在全局弱解。建立了模型算子的良定义性和有界性，进而证明了正算子的良定义性、有界性和连续Fréchet可微性。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为热粘弹性系统的逆参数识别问题提供了严格的数学框架，建立了全局解的存在性和正算子的正则性，为后续的逆问题求解奠定了基础。

title: On Liouville's theorem for the Hessian quotient equation $σ_2/σ_1$
summary: We prove Liouville's theorem for semi-convex entire solutions to Hessian quotient equation $σ_2/σ_1=1$ in $\mathbb{R}^n$. The proof is based on the observation that after rewriting the quotient operator as the $σ_2$ operator, acting on a new function, one can refer to the recent result of Shankar and Yuan on Liouville's theorem for $σ_2$ equation.

AI.tldr: 证明了Hessian商方程σ₂/σ₁=1的半凸整体解的刘维尔定理
AI.motivation: 研究Hessian商方程在半凸整体解情况下的刘维尔型定理，这是椭圆偏微分方程理论中的重要问题
AI.method: 通过将商算子重写为作用在新函数上的σ₂算子，然后引用Shankar和Yuan关于σ₂方程刘维尔定理的最新结果
AI.result: 证明了在ℝⁿ中，Hessian商方程σ₂/σ₁=1的半凸整体解满足刘维尔定理
AI.conclusion: 通过巧妙的算子变换，将Hessian商方程的刘维尔定理问题转化为已知的σ₂方程结果，从而建立了该方程的刘维尔定理

title: Phase transitions and linear stability for the mean-field Kuramoto-Daido model
summary:
We consider the mean-field noisy Kuramoto-Daido model, which is a McKean-Vlasov equation on the circle with bimodal interaction $W(θ)=\cosθ+m\cos2θ$ for $m\ge 0$ and interaction strength $K$, generalizing the celebrated noisy Kuramoto model corresponding to $m=0$.
  Our first contribution is to characterize the phase transition threshold $K_{c}$ by comparing it to the linear stability threshold $K_\# = \min (1, m^{-1})$ of the uniform distribution. When $m \leq 1/2,$ $K_{c}=1$, coinciding with that of the Kuramoto model. On the other hand, for $m \geq 2$, we show $K_c= m^{-1}$. We also classify the regimes in which the phase transition is continuous or discontinuous.
  Our second contribution is to analyze the linear stability of a global minimizer $q$ (the ``ordered phase'') of the mean-field free energy in the supercritical regime $K>1$. This stationary solution of the Kuramoto-Daido equation is unique up to translation invariance and distinct from the uniform distribution (the ``disordered phase''). Our approach extends the Dirichlet form method of Bertini et al. from the unimodal to bimodal setting. In particular, for $m \leq 1.590 \times 10^{-4}$ and $K>1$, we show an explicit lower bound on the spectral gap of the linearized McKean-Vlasov operator at $q$. To our knowledge, this is the first rigorous stability analysis for this class of models with bimodal interactions.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了具有双峰相互作用的平均场噪声Kuramoto-Daido模型，确定了相变阈值并分析了有序相的线性稳定性。
AI.motivation: 研究双峰相互作用Kuramoto-Daido模型的相变行为，扩展经典的Kuramoto模型（m=0），理解双峰相互作用如何影响系统的相变阈值和稳定性。
AI.method: 采用McKean-Vlasov方程方法，通过比较线性稳定性阈值K_#，确定相变阈值K_c。使用Dirichlet形式方法扩展Bertini等人的工作，分析有序相q的线性稳定性，并给出谱隙的显式下界。
AI.result: 当m≤1/2时，K_c=1（与Kuramoto模型相同）；当m≥2时，K_c=m^{-1}。对于m≤1.590×10^{-4且K>1，给出了线性化McKean-Vlasov算子在有序相q处谱隙的显式下界。
AI.conclusion: 该工作首次对双峰相互作用Kuramoto-Daido模型进行了严格的稳定性分析，完整刻画了相变阈值并证明了有序相的线性稳定性，为理解这类复杂系统的动力学行为提供了理论基础。

title: Invariant Gibbs dynamics for the hyperbolic sinh-Gordon model
summary: We study the hyperbolic defocusing sinh-Gordon model with parameter $β^2>0$ and its associated Gibbs dynamics on the two-dimensional torus. We establish global well-posedness of the model for a certain range of parameters $β^2>0$ with the corresponding Gibbs measure initial data and prove invariance of the Gibbs measure under the flow, thereby resolving a question posed by Oh, Robert, and Wang (2019). Our physical space approach hinges on developing a novel $L^\infty$-based well-posedness theory for wave equations with exponential-type nonlinearities, going beyond the classical $L^2$-based framework. This refinement allows us to fully leverage structural properties of Gaussian multiplicative chaos. As a by-product of our method, we also obtain an improved well-posedness theory for the hyperbolic Liouville model.

AI.tldr: 研究双曲散焦sinh-Gordon模型及其Gibbs动力学，在二维环面上建立特定参数范围的全局适定性，证明Gibbs测度在流下的不变性。
AI.motivation: 解决Oh、Robert和Wang（2019）提出的问题，即证明sinh-Gordon模型的Gibbs测度在动力学下的不变性，这需要超越经典L²框架的新理论。
AI.method: 发展基于L∞的适定性理论来处理指数型非线性波动方程，充分利用高斯乘性混沌的结构特性，超越传统的L²框架。
AI.result: 对于特定参数范围β²>0，建立了模型的全局适定性，证明了Gibbs测度在流下的不变性，同时改进了双曲Liouville模型的适定性理论。
AI.conclusion: 通过创新的L∞框架成功解决了sinh-Gordon模型的Gibbs测度不变性问题，该方法也为处理类似指数非线性波动方程提供了新工具。
